text: The numismatic series Natural Resources of Peru ("Recursos naturales del Perú" in Spanish) is a series of coins minted by the Central Reserve Bank of Peru with the aim of both promoting a numismatic culture and highlighting the natural wealth of Peru.NUMISMATIC SERIES "NATURAL RESOURCES OF PERU" - Central Reserve Bank of Peru All coins in the series have the denomination of 1 Nuevo Sol and are legal tender throughout the country. Ten million units of each of the following coins have been minted:Peru's Central Bank unveils new coin series - in Andina Agencia Peruana de Noticias {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- style="text-align:center; border-bottom:2px solid gray;" !
